Symbol.Script_3D:
! Stacked Washer and Dryer
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
IF useSysMat THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
! --- WASHER AND DRYER BODY --- !
unID = 1 IF mbShow THEN
HOTSPOT -A/2, 0,0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, 0,0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2,-B,0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2,-B,0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, 0,ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, 0,ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2,-B,ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2,-B,ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1
buttonR = MIN(0.04, A/12)
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN ! Detailed ADDx A/2 ROTx 90 ROTy -90 PRISM 7,A, 0, 0, B, 0, B, washerHeight, sWidth, washerHeight, dryerDepth, washerHeight + dryerDepth - sWidth, dryerDepth, ZZYZX, 0, ZZYZX DEL 3
! --- Washer's door
RESOL res/2 R = 0.02 gx = A/2 - 0.04 gy = B-sWidth-0.14 ADD 0,-B+0.04,washerHeight PRISM_ 9, 0.01, -gx, gy-R, 79, -gx, 0+R, 79, -gx+R, 0, 1079, gx-R, 0, 79, gx, 0+R, 1079, gx, gy-R, 79, gx-R, gy, 1079, -gx+R, gy, 79, -gx, gy-R, 1079 DEL 1
! --- Dryer's door
R = 0.02 gx = A/2 - 0.04 gy = ZZYZX-washerHeight-dryerDepth+sWidth-0.18
ROTx 90 ADD 0,washerHeight + dryerDepth - sWidth + 0.04, dryerDepth PRISM_ 9, 0.01, -gx, gy-R, 79, -gx, 0+R, 79, -gx+R, 0, 1079, gx-R, 0, 79, gx, 0+R, 1079, gx, gy-R, 79, gx-R, gy, 1079, -gx+R, gy, 79, -gx, gy-R, 1079
DEL 2
! --- Buttons
RESOL res/2 ROTx 90 ADD 0.4*A, ZZYZX-0.06, dryerDepth CYLIND 0.03,buttonR DEL 1 ADD -0.4*A, ZZYZX-0.06, dryerDepth CYLIND 0.03,buttonR DEL 1 ADD -0.2*A, ZZYZX-0.06, dryerDepth CYLIND 0.03,buttonR DEL 2 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN ! Simple ADDx A/2 ROTx 90 ROTy -90 PRISM 7,A, 0, 0, B, 0, B, washerHeight, sWidth, washerHeight, dryerDepth, washerHeight + dryerDepth - sWidth, dryerDepth, ZZYZX, 0, ZZYZX DEL 3 ENDIF
ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
DEL TOP RESOL res
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 16, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 16, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 16 END
Symbol.Script_2D:
! Stacked Washer and Dryer
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
unID = 1 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
DrawingNum = 1 IF DrawingNum = 1 AND GLOB_CONTEXT <> 22 THEN ! Top
! --- MAIN BOX --- !
HOTSPOT2 -A/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2,-B, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2,-B, unID: unID=unID+1
POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -A/2, 0, 1, A/2, 0, 1, A/2,-B, 1, -A/2,-B, 1
LINE2 -A/2,-dryerDepth, A/2,-dryerDepth
IF gs_fill_pen THEN PEN gs_fill_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 3+32, 4, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1, mbShow = 0 ENDIF
PEN gs_cont_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1, mbShow = 0 ENDIF DEL TOP
! --- OTHER VIEWS --- !
ROT2 (SYMB_MIRRORED - NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED)) * (DrawingNum > 1) * SYMB_ROTANGLE
IF DrawingNum = 2 THEN PROJECT2 -3, 90, 2 ! Bottom IF DrawingNum = 3 THEN PROJECT2 4, 270, 2 ! Front IF DrawingNum = 4 THEN PROJECT2 4, 90, 2 ! Back IF DrawingNum = 5 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * SYMB_MIRRORED, 2 ! Right IF DrawingNum = 6 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Left
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConShow_1=0, ConEdit_1 = 1, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConShow_2=0, ConEdit_2 = 1, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConShow_3=0, ConEdit_3 = 1 DEL 1
END
Symbol.Script_1D:
! Stacked Washer and Dryer
EPS = 0.0001
! --- HARDCODED AND DERIVED VARIABLES --- !
dryerDepth = 0.8 * B sWidth = 0.25 * B ! stricture width minDryerH = 0.25
ZZYZX = MAX(ZZYZX, 0.90 + sWidth + minDryerH)
washerHeight = MIN(0.90, ZZYZX + 0.55 * B - dryerDepth)
minH = washerHeight+minDryerH+dryerDepth-sWidth
z = 0
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! Stacked Washer and Dryer
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_vis_attr[4][4] FOR i = 1 TO 4 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 2 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 7
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[3] ui_con_type[1] = 0 ui_con_type[2] = 0 ui_con_type[3] = 0
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Stacked Washer and Dryer
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN minW = 0.3 IF A<minW THEN A=minW PARAMETERS A=minW ENDIF VALUES "A" RANGE [minW,]
minD = 0.10 IF B<minD THEN B=minD PARAMETERS B=minD ENDIF VALUES "B" RANGE [minD,]
!!! minH = ! Defined in the master script
IF ZZYZX<minH THEN ZZYZX=minH PARAMETERS ZZYZX=minH ENDIF VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [minH,] ENDIF
! --- OBJECT SPECIFIC PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN minX = -A/2+ConWidth_1/2 maxX = A/2-ConWidth_1/2 minZ = ConWidth_1/2 maxZ = ZZYZX-ConWidth_1/2 VALUES "ConPosX_1" RANGE [minX, maxX] VALUES "ConPosZ_1" RANGE [minZ, maxZ] IF ConPosX_1<minX THEN ConPosX_1=minX PARAMETERS ConPosX_1=minX ENDIF IF ConPosX_1>maxX THEN ConPosX_1=maxX PARAMETERS ConPosX_1=maxX ENDIF IF ConPosZ_1<minZ THEN ConPosZ_1=minZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1=minZ ENDIF IF ConPosZ_1>maxZ THEN ConPosZ_1=maxZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1=maxZ ENDIF
minX = -A/2+ConWidth_2/2 maxX = A/2-ConWidth_2/2 minZ = ConWidth_2/2 maxZ = ZZYZX-ConWidth_2/2 VALUES "ConPosX_2" RANGE [minX, maxX] VALUES "ConPosZ_2" RANGE [minZ, maxZ] IF ConPosX_2<minX THEN ConPosX_2=minX PARAMETERS ConPosX_2=minX ENDIF IF ConPosX_2>maxX THEN ConPosX_2=maxX PARAMETERS ConPosX_2=maxX ENDIF IF ConPosZ_2<minZ THEN ConPosZ_2=minZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2=minZ ENDIF IF ConPosZ_2>maxZ THEN ConPosZ_2=maxZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2=maxZ ENDIF
minX = -A/2+ConWidth_3/2 maxX = A/2-ConWidth_3/2 minZ = ConWidth_3/2 maxZ = ZZYZX-ConWidth_3/2 VALUES "ConPosX_3" RANGE [minX, maxX] VALUES "ConPosZ_3" RANGE [minZ, maxZ] IF ConPosX_3<minX THEN ConPosX_3=minX PARAMETERS ConPosX_3=minX ENDIF IF ConPosX_3>maxX THEN ConPosX_3=maxX PARAMETERS ConPosX_3=maxX ENDIF IF ConPosZ_3<minZ THEN ConPosZ_3=minZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3=minZ ENDIF IF ConPosZ_3>maxZ THEN ConPosZ_3=maxZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3=maxZ ENDIF ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 3
! --- WASTE CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Соединение Трубы - Канализация`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0, A) VALUES "ConDepth_1" RANGE (0, A)
LOCK "ConType_1"
IF ConWidth_1<EPS THEN ConWidth_1=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=EPS ENDIF
PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = 0
VALUES "ConWallThickness_1" RANGE [0, ConWidth_1/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- COLD WATER CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Соединение Трубы - Холодная Вода`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN VALUES "ConLength_2" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE (0, A) VALUES "ConDepth_2" RANGE (0, A)
LOCK "ConType_2"
IF ConWidth_2<EPS THEN ConWidth_2=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=EPS ENDIF
PARAMETERS ConPosY_2 = 0
VALUES "ConWallThickness_2" RANGE [0, ConWidth_2/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- HOT WATER CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 3 ConName = `Соединение Трубы - Горячая Вода`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN VALUES "ConLength_3" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_3" RANGE (0, A) VALUES "ConDepth_3" RANGE (0, A)
LOCK "ConType_3"
IF ConWidth_3<EPS THEN ConWidth_3=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_3=EPS ENDIF
VALUES "ConWallThickness_3" RANGE [0, ConWidth_3/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_3, ConPosY = ConPosY_3, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_3, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_3, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_3, ConWidth = ConWidth_3, ConDepth = ConDepth_3, ConLength = ConLength_3, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_3, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_3, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_3, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_3, ConToolType = ConToolType_3, ConStatus = ConStatus_3, ConType_3 = ConType_3, ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_3, ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_3, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
